name: Damien Muselet
content: Damien Muselet Damien Muselet Introduction           Publications Assistant Professor Hubert Curien Lab UMR CNRS 5516 University of Jean Monnet Saint-Etienne - FRANCE Tel: +33 (0)4 77 91 57 55 E-mail: damien dot muselet at univ-st-etienne dot fr Introduction I am currently Assistant Professor at the University of Saint-Etienne where I am teaching diverse Computer Vision topics (3D reconstruction, Tracking and motion analysis, Color processing), Deep Learning and Machine Learning, and Color Science. I'm mainly teaching in the engineer school Telecom Saint-Etienne. I'm also the academic coordinator of the European Master (EMJM) (IMLEX), that addresses all the issues surrounding IMage and Lighting for EXtended reality. I am a member of the computer vision team of (Hubert Curien Laboratory) (UMR CNRS 5516). The aim of my research is to automatically extract physical, semantic and robust information from colour images. My current research interests are color constancy and invariance, 3D motion analysis, light reflection models, explainable and frugal AI...
